title: My Second post
author: Aneesh Bhat
content:
### Welcome to my Blog
*this is the second post, It's better than the first*

Why you ask? It's because it's only meant for people who took the pain of clicking on the second blog, which means that you ventured into the site a bit. That's my content strategy, lure people in with substandard stuff, and then give them the good stuff. You say that's counterintuitive, but I say that's genius.

That was the second post, don't bother reading the third. Bye.

title: My First post
author: Aneesh Bhat
content:
### Welcome to my Blog
*This is the first post, I hope you like it*

This blog is about **Science**, **Philosophy**, and everything I have a **misguided opinion** on. I hope you like reading it. If you do please follow this blog regularly as it will help me grow and make me a lot of money.

Anyway, I have said enough it seems. See you in the next post. Bye for now.
